attributes.action: Change the name of Hungary to Magyarland.
attributes.additional_details:
Majurland is also an acceptable version, as that is the phonetic way of saying it. 
Please take this into consideration.
attributes.background:
I am a Hungarian person and I can't stand it anymore! Ever since I came out here I was asked if I was hungry, because I am from Hungary. It is not funny and I believe that most other Hungarians don't like either. 
Also Hungary is not even similar to Magyar (the real way of saying Hungary). Please!
